title: Banana Bread
ingredients: 4 bananas, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups flour, 1/2 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp baking powder, pinch salt, 1/4 cup nuts (we like pecans),

title: Broccoli Beer Cheese Soup
ingredients: 4 tablespoons butter, 1 cup diced onion, 1/2 cup shredded carrot, 1/2 cup diced celery, 1 tablespoon garlic, 1/4 cup flour, 1 quart chicken broth, 1 cup heavy cream, 10 ounces muenster cheese, 1 cup white white wine, 1 cup pale beer, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon hot sauce,

title: Cauliflower Cacciatore
ingredients: 1 head of cauliflower, 1lb mini sweet peppers, 1 yellow onion, diced, 5oz mild goat cheese (we like Chavrie brand), 5oz sour cream, jar of cacciatore sauce (we like Cookwell & Company), 1 cup red wine, croutons (we make our own), fresh cilantro,

title: Crispy Carrots
ingredients: 1 lb carrot sticks (or baby carrots), 2 oranges (or any citrus), 2 tbsp butter, 1 package phyllo dough, 1/2 cup honey, sesame seeds to top, vegetable oil,

title: Crockpot Buffalo Chicken
ingredients: 6-8 chicken breasts, 1 packet ranch mix, 1 bottle Frank's Red Hot, 1 stick of butter,

title: Downtown Marinade
ingredients: 1 cup Italian dressing, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup chili paste (like [sambal oelek](https://amzn.to/2NuqquF)), 1/4 sugar, dash hot sauce (like Texas Champagne or Yellowbird),

title: Falafel-Hummus Plate
ingredients: falafel, olives, eggplant, carrots, sugar, tahini, hummus, sesame seeds, olive oil, pomegranate seeds, parsley, vinegar, salt, pepper, chili flakes,

title: Green Chile Stew
ingredients: 1 jar of [green chile stew mix](http://amzn.to/1KYXSjo), 1lb ground chicken, 1 red onion, 1 green onion, 1 can corn,

title: Green Spaghetti
ingredients: dried spaghetti, giant bunch of dark greens (see notes), 4 cloves of garlic, 1/4 cup parmesan cheese, 1.4 cup ricotta or queso fresco,

title: Jalapeno Cornbread
ingredients: 1 box "fiesta" corn bread mix, 1 can of sweet corn, 1 cup sour cream, pickled jalapeños to taste,

title: Mississippi Pot Roast
ingredients: 3-4 lbs chuck roast, 1 packet ranch mix, 1 packet au jus gravy mix, 1 stick butter, 1 jar pepperoncinis,

title: Mongolian Beef
ingredients: vegetable oil, 1⁄2 teaspoon ginger, 1 tablespoon garlic, 1⁄2 cup soy sauce, 1⁄2 cup water, 3⁄4 cup dark brown sugar, 1 lb flank steak, 1 yellow onion, 2 large green onions,

title: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: 10oz shitake mushrooms (we usually buy two 5oz grocery packages), 1 cup arborio rice, 2 cups chicken stock, 4 tbsp butter (halved), 1 small onion, diced, 6 cloves garlic, 1.5 cups white wine, 1 cup beer (drink the rest), half a lemon, 1 cup fresh grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving, sprig of parsley (or your favorite herb), salt, pepper,

title: New York Strip
ingredients: NY Strip Steak(s), salt to taste,

title: Nilla Wafer French Toast
ingredients: 4 eggs, 1/4 cup heavy cream, 2 tsp vanilla, sprinkle of sugar, 4 cups Nilla Wafers Minis,

title: One Minute Muffin
ingredients: 1⁄4 cup flax seed meal, 1⁄2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon oil, sugar to taste (or honey, stevia),

title: Pace Pork
ingredients: pork shoulder (or loin), 1 jar of Pace Picante,

title: Pork Steaks
ingredients: pork shoulder (or other cheap cut), immerison circulator (we like the [Anova](http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00UKPBXM4/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B00UKPBXM4&linkCode=as2&tag=repl-20&linkId=XMRXWQ35OJNCZVGE)),

title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
ingredients: 1 bunch of brussels, sliced thin, 2 tbsp olive oil, (optional) grated hard cheese, (optional) gold raisins or sweetened cranberries, (optional) assorted veggies, sliced thin, salt, pepper, etc to taste,

title: Roasted Okra
ingredients: 1 bunch of okra, salt, pepper, etc to taste,

title: Salt & Vinegar Potatoes
ingredients: small potatoes, splash of oil/butter, splash of vinegar, dash of salt,

title: Smashed Carrots
ingredients: 1 can carrots, 1 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp parmesan cheese, salt & pepper to taste,

title: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 1 jar Peppedew Peppers (or piquante pepper), 4oz goat cheese (any flavor), 1 tbsp mayonnaise, 1 tbsp sour cream, 1 bunch of chives, chopped, hearty shot of hot sauce (Franks, Yellowbird), hearty crack of pepper,

title: Sweet potato cakes with poached eggs
ingredients: 4 eggs + 4 egg whites, 100g harissa, 200g Greek yogurt, herbs, 500g sweet potato, 200g flour, 1 pack parsley, olive oil,

title: Sweet red lentil and vegetable salad
ingredients: red lentils, vegetable broth, eggplant, zucchini, cherry tomatos, olive oil, pepper, some flavouring sauce (soy sauce, sesame oil, ), (optional) sesame seeds, (optional) honey,
